QuestData.Title: A Promise Is A Promise
QuestData.Description:
The animals are comfortable around you. That's a good indicator of your spirit.
Actually... can you keep a secret? I want to introduce you to my friend. Nobody else knows about her.
You have to promise me first that you'll keep this between us. My Ohn would exile me from the plains if she found out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Promise Initiate Radiya to keep her secret.
